oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Discussion - Outlaws on Film - 2018-05-25
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Discussion about an upcoming documentary film on the Austin Texas music scene in the 1970's. Filmmakers Eric Geadlemann and Kelly Magelky are joined by Texas singer-songwriter Jack Ingram. Presented in support of the exhibit Outlaws & Armadillos: Country’s Roaring ’70s. Includes audio from selected video excerpts and live performance from Jack Ingram.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Eric Geadlemann; Kelly Magelky; Jack Ingram;

film / (01:00:59) Jack talks about interviewing Kristofferson and how Kris changed music / (01:04:38) Eric tells the story about Kris asking for Jack Ingram to do the interview and Jack's importance
